      • createModel

        public FormattingModel createModel(PsiElement element,
                                   CodeStyleSettings settings,
                                   FormattingMode formattingMode)
        Description copied from interface: FormattingModelBuilderEx
        Requests building the formatting model for a section of the file containing the specified PSI element and its children.
        Specified by:
        createModel in interface FormattingModelBuilderEx
        Parameters:
        element - the top element for which formatting is requested.
        settings - the code style settings used for formatting.
        formattingMode - formatting mode
        Returns:
        the formatting model for the file.
        See Also:
        FormattingModelBuilderEx.createModel(PsiElement, TextRange, CodeStyleSettings, FormattingMode)

      • getIndentOptionsToUse

        public CommonCodeStyleSettings.IndentOptions getIndentOptionsToUse(PsiFile file,
                                                                   FormatTextRanges ranges,
                                                                   CodeStyleSettings settings)
        Description copied from interface: FormattingModelBuilderEx
        Allows to adjust indent options to used during performing formatting operation on the given ranges of the given file.

        Default algorithm is to query given settings for indent options using given file's language as a key.

        Specified by:
        getIndentOptionsToUse in interface FormattingModelBuilderEx
        Parameters:
        file - target file which content is going to be reformatted
        ranges - given file's ranges to reformat
        settings - code style settings holder
        Returns:
        indent options to use for the target formatting operation (if any adjustment is required); null to trigger default algorithm usage
        See Also:
        FileIndentOptionsProvider

      • getRangeAffectingIndent

        public TextRange getRangeAffectingIndent(PsiFile file,
                                         int offset,
                                         ASTNode elementAtOffset)
        Description copied from interface: FormattingModelBuilder
        Returns the TextRange which should be processed by the formatter in order to calculate the indent for a new line when a line break is inserted at the specified offset.
        Specified by:
        getRangeAffectingIndent in interface FormattingModelBuilder
        Parameters:
        file - the file in which the line break is inserted.
        offset - the line break offset.
        elementAtOffset - the parameter at offset
        Returns:
        the range to reformat, or null if the default range should be used
